blocks.name: orvcelval
blocks.content: Preimage maps produced by the membership relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm orvcelval(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, corvc(cep), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, corvc(cep), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cima(ccnv(c0), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c1))), w0)
  orrvcval4(hs0, c0, cep, c1, c2, cbrsiga, w0)
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c0), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c1)), c1, w0)
  3eqtr2d(crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c1)), c1, crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), cin(cr, c1), w0)
  rabbidv(hs0, cr, w0, wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl(w0, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
  epelg(c1, cbrsiga, cv(hs0))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(cr, c1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfin5(hs0, cr, c1)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cin(cr, c1), c1), wss(c1, cr))
  syl(w0, wss(c1, cr), wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
  syl6sseq(c1, cr, cuni(cbrsiga), wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
  elssuni(c1, cbrsiga)
  unibrsiga()
  sseqin2(c1, cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm orvcelval(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oRVC(∈)]c1)=(`' c0 " c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Prob)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ BrSiga)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[oRVC(∈)]c1), (`' c0 " c1), (`' c0 " { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[∈]c1 }), w0)
  orrvcval4(hs0, c0, cep, c1, c2, cbrsiga, w0)
  imaeq2d(`' c0, { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[∈]c1 }, c1, w0)
  3eqtr2d({ hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[∈]c1 }, c1, { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0 ∈ c1 }, (ℝ ⋂ c1), w0)
  rabbidv(hs0, cr, w0, hs0[∈]c1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl(w0, (hs0[∈]c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1), c1 ∈ BrSiga)
  epelg(c1, cbrsiga, hs0)
  a1i(w0, (ℝ ⋂ c1)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0 ∈ c1 })
  dfin5(hs0, cr, c1)
  sylib(w0, (ℝ ⋂ c1)= c1, c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  syl(w0, c1 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ BrSiga)
  syl6sseq(c1, cr, ⋃ BrSiga, c1 ∈ BrSiga)
  elssuni(c1, cbrsiga)
  unibrsiga()
  sseqin2(c1, cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: orvcelel
blocks.content: Preimage maps produced by the membership relation are measurable sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm orvcelel(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, corvc(cep), c1), cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, corvc(cep), c1), cdm(c2), cima(ccnv(c0), c1), w0)
  orvcelval(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  mpd(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c2)), wral(hs0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c2))))
  rrvfinvima(hs0, c0, c2, w0)
  rspcdv(hs0, cbrsiga, c1, w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c2)))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c2), cima(ccnv(c0), c1), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cbrsiga)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm orvcelel(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oRVC(∈)]c1)∈ dom(c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Prob)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ BrSiga)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[oRVC(∈)]c1), dom(c2), (`' c0 " c1), w0)
  orvcelval(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  mpd(w0, (`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ BrSiga,(`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c2)))
  rrvfinvima(hs0, c0, c2, w0)
  rspcdv(hs0, cbrsiga, c1, w0, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c2), (`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(c2))
  eleq1d((`' c0 " hs0), dom(c2), (`' c0 " c1), (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  imaeq2d(`' c0, hs0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cbrsiga)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(c2))
}

blocks.name: dstrvval
blocks.content: The value of the distribution of a random variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dstrvval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cima(ccnv(c3), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(crrv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cima(ccnv(c3), c1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)))), c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1)), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)))), c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1))), wcel(c1, cbrsiga))
  fvmpt(s0, c1, cbrsiga, cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)))), cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1)), cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0))))
  fveq2d(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)), co(c3, corvc(cep), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c1, c3, corvc(cep))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), cv(s0)))))
  fvex(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1))
  fveq2d(c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1), cima(ccnv(c3), c1), w0)
  orvcelval(c3, c1, c2, w0)
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, co(c3, corvc(cep), c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, corvc(cep), c1)
  diff.corvc.s(s0, cep)
  diff.cep.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dstrvval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)=(c2 `(`' c3 " c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Prob)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(rRndVar ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ BrSiga)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0 ` c1), (c2 `(`' c3 " c1)), ((s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0)))` c1), (c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]c1)), w0)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0))), w0)
  syl(w0, ((s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0)))` c1)=(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]c1)), c1 ∈ BrSiga)
  fvmpt(s0, c1, cbrsiga, (s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0))), (c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]c1)), (c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0)))
  fveq2d(c2, (c3[oRVC(∈)]s0), (c3[oRVC(∈)]c1), s0 = c1)
  oveq2(s0, c1, c3, oRVC(∈))
  eqid((s0 ∈ BrSiga ↦(c2 `(c3[oRVC(∈)]s0))))
  fvex(c2, (c3[oRVC(∈)]c1))
  fveq2d(c2, (c3[oRVC(∈)]c1), (`' c3 " c1), w0)
  orvcelval(c3, c1, c2, w0)
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, (c3[oRVC(∈)]c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, oRVC(∈), c1)
  diff.corvc.s(s0, cep)
  diff.cep.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dstrvprob
blocks.content: The distribution of a random variable is a probability law. (TODO: could be shortened using ~ dstrvval ) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dstrvprob(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(crrv, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c0))))
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c0)), cfv(cmeas, cbrsiga), w0)
  syl3anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cmeas, cbrsiga)), wf(c0, cbrsiga, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0), wral(hs0, cpw(cbrsiga), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))
  fmpt3d(s0, c0, cbrsiga, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0))), w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0, cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), emptycls)), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), emptycls)), w0)
  fvmptd(s0, c0, emptycls, cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), emptycls)), cbrsiga, cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0))), cr, w0)
  fveq2d(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0)), co(c2, corvc(cep), emptycls), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  oveq2d(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0), emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  probvalrnd(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), emptycls), w0)
  orvcelel(c2, emptycls, c1, w0)
  fveq2d(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), emptycls), cima(ccnv(c2), emptycls), w0)
  orvcelval(c2, emptycls, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(emptycls, cbrsiga))
  mp2b(wcel(emptycls, cbrsiga), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  0elsiga(cbrsiga)
  syl5eq(cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), emptycls)), nat0, cfv(c1, emptycls), w0)
  fveq2i(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), emptycls), emptycls)
  ima0(ccnv(c2))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0), wcel(c1, cprb))
  probnul(c1)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(cbrsiga), w0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))), cfv(c1, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cfv(c1, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))))), wfun(c2))
  fveq2d(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cuni(cv(hs0))), ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))), wfun(c2))
  unipreima(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl112anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(c1, ciun(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))), cesum(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c1))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cdm(c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cmeas, cdm(c1))), wcel(c1, cprb))
  domprobmeas(c1)
  ralrimi(s0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cbrsiga))
  r19.21bi(s0, cbrsiga, w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))
  rrvfinvima(s0, c2, c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))), wfun(c2), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  ffund(c2, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wf(c2, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  disjpreima(s0, c2, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  measvuni(s0, c1, cdm(c1), cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))
  dstrvval(s0, c0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cbrsiga, cfv(c1, co(c2, corvc(cep), cv(s0))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cbrsiga), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  mp1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  sigaclcu(cbrsiga, cv(hs0))
  esumeq2d(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimi(s0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))))
  nfan(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  nfv(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cbrsiga))))
  nfan(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wdisj(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  nfv(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
